program.title: Program
program.tba: Program details coming soon! Stay tuned for updates.

civil.special: Estelle and Julien arrive by donkey!

chat.title: Wedding Assistant
chat.subtitle: FAQ
chat.aiHelper: Our wedding AI answers all of your questions
chat.barSubtitle: Get help with transportation, hotels, program details, and more
examples: How do I get to Kea Island?

auth.welcomeSubtitle: Please enter your family password to access the wedding information
auth.helpText: Contact us if you need help with your family password

schedule.title: wedding weekend schedule
schedule.message: I'm planning my trip to Greece - can you walk me through what's happening over the wedding weekend so I know what to expect and can plan accordingly?

events.title: planned events
events.message: This sounds like it's going to be quite the celebration! What kind of events and activities do you have planned for us guests?

welcome.title: welcome party details
welcome.message: A Greek island wedding sounds amazing! What can I expect from the welcome events? I want to make sure I'm prepared for the vibe.

ceremony.title: ceremony details
ceremony.message: Tell me about the ceremony! Is there anything special or unique planned that I should know about as a guest?

gettingThere.title: getting to Kea Island
gettingThere.message: Greece sounds amazing, but I'm honestly not sure how to get to this island. Can you break down the travel process for me?

carRental.title: car rental needed?
carRental.message: I'm wondering about getting around the island - do I need to rent a car, or will I be able to get to all the events without one?

helicopter.title: helicopter transfers
helicopter.message: I'm curious about travel options - are there any faster or more direct ways to get to the island besides the typical routes?

ferry.title: ferry schedules
ferry.message: I'm trying to plan my flights and wondering about the ferry connection to the island. What should I know about ferry schedules and timing?

whereStay.title: where to stay
whereStay.message: I need accommodation advice for the island - what are the best options for wedding guests? Any recommendations for good places to stay?

recommendations.title: hotel recommendations
recommendations.message: I'm looking for specific hotel suggestions on Kea Island. What would you recommend for wedding guests in terms of location and quality?

shuttles.title: shuttle services
shuttles.message: I'm wondering about transportation between my hotel and the wedding venues. Are there shuttle services available for guests?

promoCodes.title: hotel promo codes
promoCodes.message: Are there any special rates or group discounts available for wedding guests at the recommended hotels?

howTo.title: RSVP
howTo.message: I'm ready to confirm my attendance! What's the RSVP process for letting you know I'm coming to the wedding?

change.title: RSVP
change.message: If my plans change and I need to update my RSVP, is that possible? What's the RSVP process for making changes?

whatPack.title: what to pack
whatPack.message: I'm planning what to bring for a wedding weekend in Greece - any packing suggestions or recommendations for what to wear?

weather.title: June weather
weather.message: What's the weather typically like on Kea Island in June? I want to pack appropriately and know what to expect.

activities.title: island activities
activities.message: I'm excited to explore the island during my free time! What are some fun activities or interesting things to see and do on Kea?

dressCode.title: dress code
dressCode.message: What should I wear to the different wedding events? I want to make sure I'm dressed appropriately for each occasion.

auth.homeMessage: To help you best with wedding info, I need to know who you are. Sign in with your name to continue!
auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your first and last name to access wedding info
auth.helpText: Having trouble? Drop us a line if you can't find your name on the guest list
auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your details.
